column3: Latest;Preah Sihanouk Province:------ A tornado came down from Bokor mountain and left many residents’ homes damaged on December 3
column4: 2019.------According to the official who reviewed the preliminary information
column5: 569 properties  were damaged and  in 4 communes: Veal Rinh commune
column7: Teuk Laek district and Teuk Thla commune
column10: local officials in each commune reported that there were no casualties.The four affected communes are located along National Road 3 to Kampot near the foot of Kamchay-Bokor Mountain. ------TVFB
